metadata.title: Friday, 24th March, 2023
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) why the construction of the National Registration Office in Katete District has stalled;
(b) when the project will resume;
(c) who the contractor for the project is;
(d) how much money was owed to the contractor, as of March, 2022; and
(e) what the cost of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when construction of the following infrastructure in Kanchibiya District will commence:

(i) a civic centre;                                                                                      (iv) high cost houses; (ii) a police station;                                                                                  (v) medium cost houses; and (iii) a post office;                                                                                      (vi) low cost houses;
(b) what the cause of the delay in commencing the projects is;
(c) what the cost of each project is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of each project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to rehabilitate the Chinsali - Chilubanama road which connects Chama to Chinsali District; and
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Home Affairs and Internal Security
parts: (a) when the construction of the Milenge Police Station in Milenge District will be completed; and
(b) what the cause of the delay in completing the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines and Minerals Development
parts: (a) when Kashime Mine, owned by First Quantum Minerals Limited in Upper Lunsemfwa/Kanjili area in Mkushi District, will become operational;
(b) what the cause of the delay in operationalising the Mine is; and
(c) what plans the Government has in the event that the Mine is not Operationalized by the owners.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to tar the following township roads in Chimwemwe Parliamentary Constituency:
(i) Vanadium and Zircon in Itimpi Ward; (ii) Government, in Kamatipa Ward; and (iii) Kabala, in Chimwemwe Ward;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) when the construction of the civic centre in Mwansabombwe District will be completed;
(b) what the cause of delay in completing the project is; and
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is.

questions.minister: Minister of Youth, Sport and Arts
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a stadium in Mongu District;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) what the seating capacity of the stadium will be.
